snippet: Goalkeeper Jimmy Nielsen extended his scoreless streak to 519 minutes with his fifth straight shutout in Sporting Kansas City’s 1-0 victory over the Red Bulls in Harrison, N.J.
abstract: Sporting Kansas City defeats New York Red Bulls, 1-0; other soccer results noted.
lead_paragraph: Goalkeeper Jimmy Nielsen extended his scoreless streak to 519 minutes with his fifth straight shutout in Sporting Kansas City’s 1-0 victory over the Red Bulls in Harrison, N.J.
